data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Men, Qiu-Lei, Young, Chen W., Starkevich, Pavel, Yu, Yong-Fu, Lei, Xiao-Ping (2017): Two new species of Tipula (Vestiplex) from Southern China based on morphological and molecular data, with redescription of Tipula (Vestiplex) bicalcarata (Diptera, Tipulidae, Tipulinae). ZooKeys 658: 63-80, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.658.9738, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.658.9738
